attributes.description: We offer a premium selection of approved and quality inspected vehicles you can purchase with confidence. All vehicles undergo our OEM mechanical inspection as well as a third-party road worthy certificate upon delivery. We do assist with finance and deliver nationwide to make your experience as effortless as possible. Service/ maintenance plans and mechanical warranties are available for your peace of mind. All trade ins are accepted subject to view. All above services are included in our on the road fees. Contact us to become part of the Hatfield family.

attributes.description: An extremely highly specced 750 with low kms and valid Motorplan  until mid 23 or 100,000kms. The car can best be described as being as new. Spectacular array of extras including the rear entertainment package, On board screens and tablet, electric rear seats, heated seats, night vision, lane change and the list goes on. It is finished in metallic white with black leathers. This car cost well over R2 MILLION rands only 62000 kms ago.  Its a magnificent beast on the road.  Dare i mention how handsome it is compared to the monstrosity that has replaced it ??

attributes.description:
New Arrival @ Bidvest McCarthy Silverlakes. 2019 VW Tiguan TSI R-Line 4 Motion DSG 162kW with 65000kms. 

Test drives at your door, depending on your location. All vehicles come with certificates from Dekra. 

Trade-Ins are welcome. Delivery to your door.

Finance Requirements: 
1. Copy of ID 
2. Copy of Driver’s License 
3. Proof of Address 
4. 3 Months Bank Statements & 3 Months Payslips. 

Price excluding License and Registration as well as Delivery Fee and is subject to your location. 

Contact *Mac from Bidvest McCarthy Isuzu, we are based in Pretoria Silverlakes. 

Phone & WhatsApp: 0645472149

attributes.description:
2014 Volkswagen Tiguan 2.0 TDI Bluemotion Trend Fun for sale. 
Car comes with full service history books and spare key. Great feul saving SUV with loads of space and comfort for the whole family.
Standard Features: Air Conditioner; Alloy wheels; CD Front Loader; Elec. Windows - Front Back; Power steering; Radio; ABS Brakes; Airbag - Driver, Pass. Sides; Central Locking Remote; Cruise Control; EBD; Electric Mirrors; Towbar, Immobiliser; Onboard Computer and Rear Window De-mister.

Trade-Ins are Welcome.
Finance can be arranged with all major banks with a additional administrative fee. Warranty options are available.

Volkswagen Tiguan 2.0 TDI BMT Trend + Fun 4x2
Power - 81 kW @ 2750 rpm
Torque - 280 Nm @ 1750 rpm
Economy - 5.3 l/100km
Emissions - 139 g/km
Emissions Rating - EU5
Gears - 6 / FRONT
Acceleration - 11.9 seconds
Top Speed - 174 km/h
Airbags (total) - 6
Length - 4,427 cm
Seats - 5
Fuel Tank Capacity - 64 litres
Boot Capacity - 471 litres
Service Intervals - 15,000 km
